div.div: Lake Forest College vs. Cornell College
at Mount Vernon, Iowa | Ash Park

tr.td: Cornell wins coin toss, defers to second half
Kaleb Whiting kickoff 65 yards to the LFC00, Alex Pasiewicz return 100 yards to the CC00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 14:47.
Lake Forest College drive start at 15:00.
C. Courtney kickoff 43 yards to the CC22, on-side kick, recovered by LFC on CC22.
